messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Your document
messages.msgSnippet: That s probably a bot passing a virus - it s trying to get people to open an infected attachment (usually a zip file because some antivirus programs have
messages.messageBody:
That's probably a bot passing a virus - it's trying to get people to
open an infected attachment (usually a zip file because some antivirus
programs have problems with zipped files), which automatically
launches on opening.

If you get an attachment from someone you don't know, don't open it.

Daniel
